location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Commercial Department, Bombay to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a detailed list of imported fabrics at Bushire and their current market prices and requesting that the Resident sell any fabrics so long as he can fetch those prices at Bushire, as well as to sell any damaged fabrics.
